**2023-05-24 / @aclements, @andybons, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: add GOEXPERIMENT=gocacheprog to let a child process implement the internal action/output cache** [#59719](https://go.dev/issue/59719)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmp: new package with Ordered, Compare, Less; min, max as builtins** [#59488](https://go.dev/issue/59488)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/tls: support QUIC as a transport** [#44886](https://go.dev/issue/44886)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/ast: add func Unparen(Expr) Expr** [#60061](https://go.dev/issue/60061)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **html/template: refuse to parse complex JS template literals** [#60055](https://go.dev/issue/60055)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **slices: add Reverse** [#58565](https://go.dev/issue/58565)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **slices: add sorting and comparison functions** [#60091](https://go.dev/issue/60091)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: type inference should be more lenient about untyped numeric literals** [#58671](https://go.dev/issue/58671)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/tools/go/pointer: isolate, tag, and delete the pointer analysis** [#59676](https://go.dev/issue/59676)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

- **add text based intermediate representation (IR)** [#60363](https://go.dev/issue/60363)

  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
